text: Runner s highThe last   months has been one hell of a ride  Ive never been so hurt  so damaged  so unmotivated to move on  Ive been stuck with the pain  I wanted it to end so bad  my at the the moment pain  according to my therapist  but I did not see it that way  Ive had days when the coldness of a knife against my skin calms me down  Ive had days when I would run out of oxygen because I could not stop crying   I ran my third marathon a couple of days ago  It was not my best time  I went slow and steady  I was not prepared  I was not running with someone  I kept a pace I can handle and stuck with it  I did not over exert myself  I just let everything be  I went even slower on the uphills and enjoyed the downhills  I kept going  The last   kms  I could not believe I endured it all  I couldn t believe I stuck with life  I am so happy  Happy for being here  Happy for the strength to endure the pain  Happy for the support Ive received   Im going to keep a slow and steady pace in life  Ill go through with life one day at a time  Im letting everything go  the happiness and the sadness  I am accepting that I have no control of whats behind me and I will not let those deter me  Nothing can stop me
summary: The last months have been difficult for me. I've been in a lot of pain. I ran my third marathon a couple of days ago. It was not my best time, but I went slow and steady. I kept a pace I can handle and stuck with it.

text: For all the people in this sub who think that getting a girlfriend will solve all your problems  it won t  Instead focus making yourself happy as an individual and don t make your happiness dependent on other people  The vast majority of relationships at this stage of your life are temporary and and wouldn t be a reliable long term source of happiness  Getting a girlfriend won t raise your grades  won t get you in shape  won t give you money  and most importantly  isn t the only  or the best  source of happiness  There s so much more to life than relationships and there are so many other sources of happiness for you to discover for yourself  whether that s self improvement  a hobby you enjoy  or anything  Not everybody is the same  so you need to find what makes YOU happy in the long term  That doesn t mean something that only makes you happy while you re doing it  but something that improves your overall mood throughout the entire day  Long story short  the only way you will find happiness is through yourself  not a girlfriend
summary: There are many other sources of happiness than relationships. Getting a girlfriend won't raise your grades, improve your health, give you money or improve your mood. The only way to find happiness is through yourself, not a girlfriend.
cleaned: source happiness relationship get girlfriend not raise grade improve health money improve mood way find happiness not girlfriend
